thread.title: Miranda Kerr Belted Her Bare Midriff
thread.title_full: Miranda Kerr Belted Her Bare Midriff -- The Cut

author: Stephanie Eckardt
title: Miranda Kerr Belted Her Bare Midriff
text:
View Slideshow Miranda Kerr. Photo: Stefanie Keenan/Getty Images
Last night, Miranda Kerr attended the Elle Women in Hollywood Awards in a multipart powder-blue ensemble that included a fitted bandeau instead of a shirt. The model — but don't call her that — also had on pants with no belt loops. Not one to let a matching accessory go unused, Kerr resourcefully fastened her belt around her chiseled abs, demurely obscuring her belly button.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
